00046             function                update_packages( $Options )
00047             {
00048                   try
00049                   {
00050                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00051                         $PageName = $Security->get_p( 'page_record_id' , 'command' );
00052                         
00053                         $PageAccess = get_package( 'page::page_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00054                         $PageAccess->set_package_appliance( $PageName , $Security->get_p( 'page_packages' , 'unsafe_string' ) );
00055                   }
00056                   catch( Exception $e )
00057                   {
00058                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00059                   }
00060             }

00080             function                update_permitions( $Options )
00081             {
00082                   try
00083                   {
00084                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00085                         $PageName = $Security->get_p( 'page_record_id' , 'command' );
00086                         
00087                         $PermitAccess = get_package( 'permit::permit_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00088                         $Permitions = $Security->get_p( 'page_permitions' , 'unsafe_string' );
00089                         $PermitAccess->set_permits_for_page( $PageName , $Permitions );
00090                   }
00091                   catch( Exception $e )
00092                   {
00093                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00115             function                controller( $Options )
00116             {
00117                   try
00118                   {
00119                         $ContextSet = get_package( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00120                         
00121                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcxs_packages_form' );
00122                         
00123                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcxs_permitions_form' );
00124                         
00125                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
